refnamediv.refpurpose: This function converts XYZ color values to uint16.

listitem.para: list of uint16 or double array that must be real and nonsparse

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Converts an M-by-3 or M-by-N-by-3 array of XYZ color values to uint16. output has the same size as pstData.
